channel.title: Distributed System - 标签 - Don't Panic
channel.description: Distributed System - 标签 - Don't Panic

item.title: Asynchronous Model vs Synchronous Model
item.author: 作者
item.description: Synchronous Distributed System Lots of assumptions Upper Bound on Message Delivery There exists a upper bound on message delay Ordered Message Delivery communication between machines are expected to be FIFIO. Globally Synchronous Clocks Each node has a local clock, and the clocks of all nodes are always in sync with each other. Asynchronous Distributed System No Upper Bound Time Limit Message can be delayed for arbitrary amount of times.
